casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, National Association as Trustee
v.
Joseph TARZIA, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017 Joseph Tarzia, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The defendant Joseph Tarzia's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40156) is denied.

McDONALD and ROBINSON, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
